title: Track Element
shortDescriptionOfTheTag: The <track> element is used to specify text track for media elements like <audio> and <video>.

usageExamples.title: Example 1
usageExamples.description: Adding a subtitles track to a video element
usageExamples.code:
<video controls>
  <source src='movie.mp4' type='video/mp4'>
  <track src='subtitles_en.vtt' kind='subtitles' srclang='en' label='English'>
</video>

usageExamples.title: Example 2
usageExamples.description: Adding captions to a video element
usageExamples.code:
<video controls>
  <source src='movie.mp4' type='video/mp4'>
  <track src='captions_fr.vtt' kind='captions' srclang='fr' label='French'>
</video>
